title: Weakness Is Strength
verse_text: My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.
insight: Your weakness is not a liability—it’s the stage for God’s strength.
Stop hiding it; start handing it over.
one_minute_win: Tell God one weakness you’ve been ashamed of, and invite His strength into it.
declaration: My weakness is the canvas for God’s power.
